definition: to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: The children were marshalled into straight lines.
But he passed through the midst of them and went on his way.
sentences.chinese: 他却从他们中间直行，过去了。

sentences.english: Step downstairs from Exit B, go straight and take the escalator downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 从B出口下地下，直行然后乘向下的扶梯。

sentences.english: With windblown grit giving traction, the cyclists pedaled up to ten hours straight on the ice.
sentences.chinese: 骑车的人被风和细沙阻碍着在冰上直行了十个小时。

sentences.english: What happens when the bus wants to turn and the car underneath it want to go straight?
sentences.chinese: 要是巴铁想要转弯，而下面的小车要直行呢？

sentences.english: Actually I don't think I can handle the steering wheel properly and keep the car going straight.
sentences.chinese: 其实，我觉得我掌控不好方向盘，没法让车向前直行。

sentences.english: Turn right at the first street (Portland Street) and continue until you reach the main road (Mong Kok Road).
sentences.chinese: 抵达地面后向前直行，至砵兰街向右转。

sentences.english: A road sign on a crossing which saying "Road Closed Please Go Straight".
sentences.chinese: 在路口摆放“此路不通请直行”的牌子。

sentences.english: But he passing through the midst of them went his way
sentences.chinese: 他却从他们中间直行，过去了。

sentences.english: That many curved child certainly has not had to circle , the pure spot , I walk my straight profession .
sentences.chinese: 没有那么多弯子一定要绕，单纯点，我走我的直行道。

sentences.english: Drag to add a straight road with an upward angle.
sentences.chinese: 通过拖动添加向上倾斜的直行道路。

sentences.english: In life go straight and turn right.
No longer caring if we drift or go straight.
sentences.chinese: 不再关心我们是随波漂流，还是一路直行。

sentences.english: To the north, it's a straight trip to the pole.
sentences.chinese: 从此地向北直行即可到达北极。

sentences.english: Go straight and turn right at the traffic light.
sentences.chinese: 直行并在交通灯那里右转。

definition: to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
to turn/to go around a corner
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
variant of 掉頭|掉头[diao4 tou2]
to avoid/to yield (in traffic)/to get out of the way
